short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use keyboard shortcuts to control PocketCasts Web Player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension lets you control playback of the PocketCasts beta webapp without switching tabs.

Toggle playback: Alt+Shift+O
Skip backwards: Alt+Shift+I
Skip forwards: Alt+Shift+P
Alter playback speed: Alt+Shift+L
Browser button that toggles playback on left click, and a context menu with more options on right click

If PocketCasts web player isn't open, the browser button will open and pin it if clicked

This extension is a hobby project, and not affiliated with or supported by the makers of PocketCasts in anyway
